source: West Virginia Department of Veterans Assistance and 211 West Virginia

resources.name: West Virginia Division of Veterans Services
resources.description: State agency providing accredited service officers for VA claims assistance, benefits counseling, and referral to housing, employment, and education programs.

resources.name: 211 West Virginia
resources.description: Free information and referral service connecting veterans to community resources including housing, employment, food assistance, mental health services, and benefits.

resources.name: West Virginia Veterans Housing Program
resources.description: Program providing affordable housing and transitional housing for homeless veterans with supportive services and case management.

resources.name: Mountain State Veterans Center
resources.description: Comprehensive community center providing employment training, educational programs, food pantry, and health services for West Virginia veterans.

resources.name: West Virginia Veterans Legal Clinic
resources.address: West Virginia University College of Law, Morgantown, WV 26506
resources.description: Law school clinic providing free legal assistance to veterans for VA claims, discharge upgrades, and benefits disputes.

resources.name: West Virginia Employment Services for Veterans
resources.description: State employment program providing job training, job placement, and career counseling for West Virginia veterans.

resources.name: Huntington Veterans Support Services
resources.description: Community organization providing peer support groups, mental health counseling, employment assistance, and substance abuse treatment for veterans.

resources.name: West Virginia Food Bank
resources.description: Provides emergency food assistance to veterans and their families through distribution centers throughout West Virginia.

resources.name: Veterans Crisis Line - West Virginia
resources.description: 24/7 crisis support for veterans experiencing mental health crises, suicidal thoughts, or emotional distress.

resources.name: VA Medical Center - Beckley
resources.description: Federal VA medical facility providing comprehensive healthcare, mental health services, and rehabilitation programs for West Virginia veterans.
